{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = Asus PCE-N10 001.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless-N150 PCI Express Adapter |caption2 = |pp = http://www.asus.com/Networks/Wireless_Adapters/PCEN10/ |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = ASUS_PCE-N10 |wikipedia = |brand = ASUS |model = PCE-N10 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = February 2, 2011 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ASUS_PCE-N10 |sernum = |wlclass = N150 |series = |if = PCIe |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 10ec |device_id = 8176 |subvendor_id = 1043 |subdevice_id = 84b5 |windosid = |fcc_id = MSQ-PCEN10 |icid = |oui = |chip1 = Realtek;RTL8188CE; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = EW-7611PIn |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = 1x1:1 SISO, Has WPS button |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 01/31/2011 |estreldate = |price = |upc = 763615948173 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B004XFYGNK |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "1242-00000307-01Z" is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [[Edimax EW-7611PIn]] ===Linux driver=== *[http://linux-hardware-guide.com/2012-11-01-asus-pce-n10-wlan-karte-pcie-802-11n-150-mbits Linux Hardware Guide] The PCIe wireless card PCE-N10 uses the chipset [[Realtek]] RTL8188CE supported by Linux. :The card is recognized by the kernel in the following way: :'''lspci''' 
03:00.0 Network controller [0280]: Realtek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. 
        Device [10ec:8176] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: ASUSTeK Computer Inc. Device [1043:84b5]
        Kernel driver in use: rtl8192CE
and fully supported by the kernel module [[rtl8192ce]] ==Pictures==
